Urec.ioView Live

side project

design + code | React | Adobe Xd

This is a website where job seekers anonymously review their recruiters. My role is the main frontend developer and the lead UX/UI designer.

Collabrated with Athur Zhu(devop), Quan Kong(backend), Yao Zhao(frontend), Iris Zhu(frontend), and Xiaoyang Zhao(graphic design).

Online Store Demo PageView Live

personal project

design + code | AngularJS | CSS3

This is a demo online store website built with AngularJS with my original design. Users can easily review all the items they chose and edit the item list.

View this project on Github

City Facts Web App

personal project

design + code | Angular | MySQL | Node.js | Express

This is a single page web app with query functions to get data from API and MySQL database via URL. The app uses Angular as the frontend framework and Node.js + Express.js as the backend. The query input to the database is robust that misspelling would be automatically corrected.

View this project on Github

Todo List Mobile App

personal project

design + code | React Native | Firebase

This app is built with React Native and Firebase Realtime database. It not only allows you to easily edit all your items but also supports searching and sorting functions. The UI is an original design and was coded from scratch.

View this project on Github

personal project

design + code | Javascript | canvas game

I built this website as a collection of my Javascript programming practices. All functions are based on vanilla JavaScript and will be updated with ES6 practices soon. You can view all the code on the page. A canvas game coded with p5.js is also included.

Investecs developmentView Live

commercial project

design + development | Graphic | Wordpress

The official website for a real estate development company. I chose to use Wordpress framework to build the site to make the future maintenance work easier for the client. Some of the renderings on the website are also my original work.

commercial project

design + development | Graphic | HTML5 | CSS3 | JQuery

A web design and development project. This is the official website for a new condo coming into the market. I work closely with the marketing team on all the content, design and development.
